summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of A Strip of Land across Lots Sixteen (16) to Twenty-two (22) inclusive, in Block Sixty-nine (69), Mount Baker Park Addition, as described by easement granted by Hunter tract Improvement Company and accepted by Ordinance No. 35020; and Lake Washington Park Parkway, from a point near the southeast corner of Lot Twenty-two (22), Block Sixty-nine (69), Mount Baker Park Addition, to a connection with the existing sewer outfall in Landing Parkway, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tracks, catch basins, and their appurtenance necessary for the proper sewer age and drainage of said district all in accordance with Resolution No. 4875 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
